title: Al Medinah Mosque: Taraweeh Schedule
message:
Taraweeh at Al Medinah Mosque will consist of 10 rakahs, followed by 3 Shafi'i rakahs and Witr.

- First Taraweeh: 7:30 PM
- Second Taraweeh: 9:30 PM

title: Al Quds Mosque: Taraweeh Schedule
message: Taraweeh at Al Quds Mosque will consist of 8 rakahs, followed by 3 Shafi'i rakahs and Witr. The taraweeh prayer begins after Isha. Refer to the monthly calendar for exact Isha times.

title: Announcement: Commencement of Ramadan
